author: Loganwan
title: Oh the memories!
review: I was actually looking at a piece and was wondering what set it came from.  It turned out to be this one.  When I saw the cover of the guide, all of the memories came flooding back.  This was such a basic set, and made some very strange looking vehicles.  I remember the boat and "helicopter" being my favorite.  I think it was something about being 7 years-old and having something that weighed so much in my hands. That helicopter was a strange design, only a few steps from being a car.  Definitely a good beginner set, and the memories are amazing.
